title: Praying in masjid al haram is better than 100,000 prayers Is it for obligatory or voluntary prayers?
transcript: uh my question is praying in majida haram brings hundred thousand rewards but is this reward for obligatory prayer or any volunteer prayer it is for all acify any prayer you pray in the masjid al-haram it is multiply it's better than a hundred thousand elsewhere whether it's a fart or it's a sunnah or it's your winter or it's your night prayer it's all the same in the reward and allah knows best you
